text: The 1948 New Mexico gubernatorial election took place on November 2, 1948, in order to elect the Governor of New Mexico. Incumbent Democrat Thomas J. Mabry won reelection to a second term, defeating Manuel Lujan Sr., mayor of Santa Fe. ==General election== ===Results=== ==References== gubernatorial 1948 New Mexico Category:November 1948 events
title: 1948 New Mexico gubernatorial election
